awi nishpadana kamhalak sancharakayange paminima ihalata bhawitha kaloth wada waradi wishalama sappu sankirnaya gewim kadpath walin pamanayi daruwangen 69% k mathata wiliyam kumaru eeshrayala-palasthina sancharayaka janadhipathi abbasta niwmoniyawa ayithiya thahawuru karannayi illayi batahira iwuren bhagayak palasthinuwanta aapasu genwa gani nakba dinayata awurudu 70 yi uparima paya 10 yi balapam karanna saudiyata ba katar emir amerikawe katar agamathi bangladesha agamathiniyata liyayi katar emir rusiyawe biliyana 3.5ka helikoptar hadisiye godabassayi adhi-wegi dumriya sapthambaraye saudiyata sapa naw eyi guwan yanayak kada wateyi aparikshakariwa gihin dadakayi ramadan upawasa masaya arambae kandawuruwalata praharayak swairithwaya wenuwen duma nagaraye parikshana pransha janapathita brithanya agamathiniyata dos damaskas nuwara maha jana raliyak parikshakayo awilla sankramanikayo kotuwethi eeshrayala thanapathi nerapayi eksath jathinge sanwidhanayen wadak naha siriyawe sathuru ilakka wanasanawa thurkiye hadisi jala galimak thurki maha mathiwaranayata aluth pakshayak winadi 15 n dikkasada wela wasara 10 ka newasika wisa abudabi wesak mangalyaya 935 kata janapathi samawa mangala natumen usawiyata nomile amathum dunnata pasasum parsal 10,000k yemanayata mangala uthsawayakata guwan prahara saudiyata balastik misayila prahara iranaya awi sapayanawa misayila hathak winasha karala hawuthi karalikaruwo saudiyata pahara dethi
